Al-Jazeera is crucial because so many households in the Middle East turn to it in times of turmoil, said Dana Shell Smith, deputy assistant secretary for international media engagement, an office created last summer. If we are not in the conversation, people will be speaking for us or about us, said Shell Smith, who speaks Arabic. "We need to make sure we are out there speaking for ourselves."
